scene_description_enriched: A kneeling figure, dressed in a fur-trimmed robe over a red tunic, with hands clasped in prayer, faces a standing figure. The standing figure, wearing a golden chasuble over a white alb, extends their hands as if in blessing or offering. The scene takes place indoors, against a backdrop of a large, panelled door and a draped curtain. The floor is wooden, with visible planks.
